nodes.text: Rise of the Cortosis Battle Droids

The Rise of the Cortosis Battle Droids was a campaign that occurred when the Confederacy of Independent Systems began to manufacture battle droids with cortosis, a lightsaber-resistant substance. The event ended with the destruction of the C-B3 cortosis battle droid factory on Metalorn.
A number of missions and skirmishes were involved in this campaign, including a mission to Tatooine, the Coruscant Insurrection and a mission to the world of Metalorn.
